name: Tiny Tower (itch)
description:
This game is an entry to the Mallorca Gamejam 2022.

Team Name: no team name. i'm the only dev on the team

Dev Name: Carlos Pizzi

gmail: carlospizzisalas@gmail.com

Games Name: Tiny Tower

Tiny tower is a game about making the tiny tower taller, the tower is sliced in half and you job is

to put stuff in the middle to make it higher.

-----CONTROLS-----

-Camera Mode

    WASD - rotate camera

    Scroll whell - Move camera up and down

    Left Click - Select Object.

- Object Mode

    WASD - move object

    Mouse - rotate object

    R- Reset object rotation

    Scroll whell - Move object up and down

    Left Click - Release object.

--- Assets---

All the assets that are not listed here where made by me.

UI Icons - Those where made by my boyfriend, thx for the help.
